detailResultFields.value:

detailResultFields.label: Course Section Definition Public Notes
detailResultFields.value:
This course is part of the Coordinated Arts Program, Law & Society stream,  Â 
https://cap.arts.ubc.ca/streams/law-society/. Students must register in both TermÂ Â 
1 and Term 2 courses in CAP.Â 
Â 
Please register in both this lecture, and one of the following discussion sections: POLI_V 101-LZ1, POLI_V 101-LZ2, POLI_V 101-LZ3, POLI_V 101-LZ4, POLI_V 101-LZ5, or POLI_V 101-LZ6. This course is also clustered with GRSJ_V 101-227, and the Law & Society sections of the CAP stream seminar CAP_V 101. For CAP_V 101, please register in one of the following: CAP_V 101-L01, CAP_V 101-L02, CAP_V 101-L03, or CAP_V 101-L04. GRSJ_V 101-227, and CAP_V 101 do not have any additional discussion sections. Follow the prompts to register in all stream seminars (1), lectures (2), and tutorials (1-2)Â each term.Â 
Â 
For step-by-step instructions, please visit: https://cap.arts.ubc.ca/program/registration/Â 
Â 
If you encounter any issues with registration into CAP, please contact us at support.fyip@ubc.caÂ

uiLabels.WDRES.FACETEDSEARCH.SymanSyntax:
Boolean logic can be expressed using AND, OR, NOT, and (). 
Exact phrases can be surrounded by double quotation marks. 
Example: ("software engineer" OR computer science) AND ~manager~.
